images.description: The current logo for Akkas Parek, a black logomark and wordmark on a transparent background. Context: Site-wide, appears in the header/branding. Represents the company identity. While functional, it is a basic design and could be updated for a more modern, professional look.

A headshot of JUDr. Zbyněk Kašpárek, LL.M. sitting at a desk with an open laptop, looking directly at the camera. A large wooden bookcase filled with books is visible in the background. Context: Likely part of an 'About Us' or 'Team' section. Shows a key individual in a professional setting. Good lighting and composition, high resolution.

A black and white portrait of JUDr. Zbyněk Kašpárek, LL.M. dressed in a suit, with his arms crossed, looking confidently at the camera. Context: Part of the 'About Us' or 'Team' section. Provides a clear, professional headshot of a team member. Good lighting and resolution.

A black and white portrait of JUDr. Zdeněk Kašpárek, CSc. dressed in a suit, with his arms crossed, looking directly at the camera. Context: Part of the 'About Us' or 'Team' section. Provides a clear, professional headshot of a team member. Good lighting and resolution.

A black and white portrait of JUDr. Jan Charuza dressed in a suit, with his arms crossed, looking directly at the camera. Context: Part of the 'About Us' or 'Team' section. Provides a clear, professional headshot of a team member. Good lighting and resolution.

A black and white portrait of Pavla Nohejlová dressed in a blazer and white shirt, holding the lapels, and looking directly at the camera. Context: Part of the 'About Us' or 'Team' section. Provides a clear, professional headshot of a team member. Good lighting and resolution.

A close-up of a black legal textbook titled 'Právo Občanské I-V' (Civil Law I-V), with a gold ring resting on top. The background is a dark, subtly textured surface. Context: Used to symbolize civil law services or legal expertise. Good focus and composition, high resolution. Reinforces the legal theme.

Two clients, a man and a woman, are seated at a table with a male lawyer or consultant. The lawyer is pointing to a calculator, suggesting a discussion about finances or legal costs. Context: Likely used to represent consultation services, client interaction, or financial law. Good composition, well-lit, shows interaction.

A black legal textbook titled 'Trestní Právo' (Criminal Law) resting on two file folders on a wooden desk. A metal paper fastener is also visible. Context: Used to symbolize criminal law services or legal documentation. Good focus and composition, high resolution. Reinforces the legal theme.

An open planner with two business cards and a pen, positioned on a wooden desk. A vintage-style desk organizer with an inkwell and pen is blurred in the background on the left. Context: Used to symbolize commercial law services, planning, or business. Good composition and lighting.

A top-down view of hands interacting with a tablet displaying business graphs and charts, while holding a smartphone. A pen and some documents are also on the wooden desk. Context: Represents modern legal practice, data analysis, or business law services. Good composition, sharp image.

A Czech passport ('EVROPSKÁ UNIE ČESKÁ REPUBLIKA - CESTOVNÍ PAS') standing upright on a textured surface, with a blurred dark object in the background. Context: Used to symbolize administrative law, international law, or citizenship services. Clear and well-focused, good resolution.

A bright, light-toned image showing a low-angle view of modern corporate buildings soaring into the sky. The image has a somewhat desaturated or washed-out look. Context: Used as a background or section header image, symbolizing corporate law, business, or the legal landscape. The quality is acceptable but the washed-out style might need adjustment for modern design.

A wooden gavel and sound block, positioned in front of a small golden scale of justice, with a dark, open case in the background. Context: Used to symbolize justice, litigation, or general legal services. Good recognition as a legal motif, sharp image quality, good composition.
